title: This game is becoming unplayable.
body: For the past week or 2, my games haven't been loading, I've been kicked out the loading screens with an error message for no reason. I get into games, my arrow to upgrade the skills are stuck for the entire game. No lie, after games it takes roughly 5-10 minutes to get to the honor screens because of loading. If I'm in the game it's fine, low ping and normal FPS. It is as soon as I'm going into the games, or getting out of them that is the issues. I mean if this is a problem on my end please tell me some ways of fixing it. I've had no problems the past couple of years like this.

replies.body:
Getting an error on the loading screen typically points to some kind of issue with your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) but it could also be caused by some corrupted game files if your ability upgrade arrows aren't working properly either. Run through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all your bases, but also run a quick repair through the game client as well.

As far as the honor screen taking forever to load, that could be due to an option called 'close client during game'. Check for that while you're in the client options and *uncheck it* if it's turned on.
